name: Crunches With Legs Up
how_to_perform:
1. Start by lying on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, hip-width apart.
2. Engage your core muscles to support your body, feel a slight contraction in your abs as you do so.
3. Slowly lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight, and hold for a brief moment.
4. Crunch upwards by Contracting Your Abdominal Muscles, bringing your shoulders and upper back towards the ceiling.
5. Hold the crunch position for a brief moment before slowly lowering yourself down to the starting position.
6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, ensuring you maintain proper form and engage your core muscle throughout.
short_summary: Crunches with legs up is an abdominal exercise that targets the abs muscles and requires proper engagement of the core during movement.
